#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
long int gcd(long int a,long int b)
{
    long int t;
    while(b!=0){
	t=b;
	b=a%t;
	a=t;
}
return a;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    long int n,m;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%ld%ld",&n,&m);
        printf("%ld\n",gcd(n-1,m-1)+1);
    }
    return 0;
}
